posts.title: reviewing again
posts.body: This is a short review of the project so far, it checks the spelling of words, it takes note of word count, it makes it possible to make edit and it saves the edit with the date created and the date edited. We are also working towards adding an ai option to analyse the write up to provide insight about the tone of the content, writing accuracy and also detecting of the content was written by ai.

posts.title: You can also view leaderboards for the group you are currently in to see how your level stacks up against other members. This will give you a preview of which courses unlock at certain levels as well as the custom level names for each group   Admins can use set courses to unlock at certain levels to further drive participation in their communities. More on that here.
